website_summaries.verdict: These inexpensive chips work well to add apple flavor to your meat.
pros: Produces a flavorful smoke that's not too strong
Also comes in cherry, hickory, mesquite, and pecan
Smaller pieces fit easily in a variety of smokers
cons: Chips seem to burn a little quickly

customer_reviews.title: This bag will last a year if you use smoking ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag will last a year if you use smoking boxes. About the size of a large Dorito bag. I moisten the apple chips with Jack Daniels and start them 1/2 hour before the steaks. Works with pineapple juice and burgers too.
customer_reviews.author: Mark T

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Nothing can match the rich, smoky flavor of pecan chips for bbq. I have typically used mesquite, apple wood, etc, but these pecan chips add a sweetness and a deep smoky flavor to meats and seafood that is hard to beat. If you let the meat smoke long enough, you'll get a really nice, pink smoke line, deep into the flesh. I've used it on shrimp, scallops, beef burgers, rib-eyes, chicken, and brisket. Try it if you haven't before. People will be asking you what your secret is. Don't tell 'em, though; make them wonder.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan L.

customer_reviews.title: Good chips
customer_reviews.text: They give plenty of flavor, it's really not hard to accidentally use too much and overpower your meat with the apple smoke. Very tasty when used in moderation (my dogs seem to think they're tasty straight out of the bag......)
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Good results with electric smoker
customer_reviews.text: Got the apple chips as an add-on item. I am a relative novice to smoking; got an MES30 and have been experimenting with different wood types. Used apple to smoke the Thanksgiving turkey, and a hickory/apple mix for the Christmas prime rib. Got a lot of compliments and contributed to good holiday memories.
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: A Must for a Gas Grill!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Weber Spirit II grill. The grill itself is very good. However, after using a charcoal grill for many years, I have become used to the delicious smoky flavor that charcoal produces. The gas grill was just a lot less flavorful by comparison. After adding these chips to a grill smoke box, my taste buds have awakened again with that delicious smoky flavor! Trust me, if you have a gas grill you must try these! You will not go back to gas alone. Steak tastes absolutely delicious. I have tried these on ribeye, New York, and skirt steaks, and all come out smoky and flavorful.
customer_reviews.author: D.K.

customer_reviews.title: but I am very glad that Amazon has them for a fair price
customer_reviews.text: Its hard to beat the taste of a pecan smoked pork shoulder. I think the smoke is a little milder than hickory so you can leave the meat in smoke longer. Alot of people smoke pork for a couple hours then finish in the oven, I put my smoker temp at 205 and smoke for several hours and cook all day (9 hours for ribs and longer for larger/thicker cuts of meat) without any extra oven finishing process. I have used these weber chips before and I wish I could get them locally, but I am very glad that Amazon has them for a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Todd J. Kuvshinikov

customer_reviews.title: Great Price and Perfect for Smoking Pork Ribs or Shoulder
customer_reviews.text: Had bought this brand in Home Depot and this is pretty much the same thing but a better price and more convenient to order and have delivered. I use this with a Masterbuilt electronic smoker and they work perfect for that. Some larger chips in there but most are the perfect size for that application. If the price remains the same, I'll definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: B & G Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Smoke
customer_reviews.text: I use these in a smoker box with my propane grill and it is almost as good as having a dedicated smoker. The subtly sweet flavor compliments a number of meats and the price is right. I just wish they gave off a bit more smoke. These chips have taken my grilling to the next level and I'll definitely consider getting them again. ~ Kort
customer_reviews.author: Kort

customer_reviews.title: Weber succeeds again with great value and flavor! Perfect for grilling and smoking
customer_reviews.text: Great value and great flavor to my butter maple chicken! Just need to pre-soak these chips for 30 minutes prior to use and then place in smoking tray and 10 minutes later these smoke up some magnificent flavor. I have a 3 emmers grill which works great but somehow doesn't seem to give a good char on meats and I use chips to help that process and these not only help with adding a char o my chicken BUT adds tremendous flavor! Cant wait to try my other chips
customer_reviews.author: City Chick

customer_reviews.title: Weber IS Quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality applewood chips. Just the right amount of flavorful smoke. Used on a Weber gas grill...on top of the flavorbars in a small aluminum foil drip pan. Sweet, not to strong smoke with spice hints. Takes grilled foods and makes them extra special!
customer_reviews.author: Proud Dad

customer_reviews.title: Flavor Central
customer_reviews.text: These wood chips are great to add a touch of smoke flavor to anything! Smoking a pork shoulder? Soak these in water for an hour, and throw into your coals. Grilling burgers? Chunk some dry wood chips into the coals to start a wood flame to finish seat them. I always keep a bag of wood chips near my charcoal and kettle. Grab yourself a few bags too.
customer_reviews.author: hunter

customer_reviews.title: Ribs of goodness
customer_reviews.text: OK, this was an "oh look, cheap chips buy." They are now my go-to choice for pork ribs. I find them a little subtle for other meats or cuts, but my baby backs have never been better.
customer_reviews.author: Darbonzo

customer_reviews.title: L
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this product I didn't not see anything about cancer !!, When I got this product and turn on your page the first thing I saw was a warning stating in may cause cancer !!, Do not play games with people health and the so people will buy your stuff !!!, I don't like things like that, things like that Stop me from buying from your.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does The Job
customer_reviews.text: We use apple wood chips for a milder smoke flavor on things like turkeys and chickens. This bag lasts us about 2 hours which is generally about all of the time that the smoke will penetrate the food. One bag will fill the tub on our smoker. We let the wood soak in water about 1 hour prior to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Addition to Your Grilling Tool Kit
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey for the amount of wood. Once soaked, I use the chips in a vented stainless steel box over propane burner. The chips are a little hard to get ignited enough to produce smoke. I think they would be more effective on o charcoal or pellet grill, but even on the propane, the wood chips are a good addition to your “grilling tool kit”.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Great price for apple chips
customer_reviews.text: I actually wanted alder, which I did not buy for smoking fish. However, the price is what caused me to buy the applewood. The chips are nice sized and will give a long smoking time. I just wish there was alder for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Montana Rod

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great chicken wing!
customer_reviews.text: We opted to use the pecan for our chicken wings... we don't have a smoker but we use a foil pouch in our Weber Q. Works out just fine! Makes chicken wings like you've never made before. The weber q is hard to get the temp just right for smoking, but that has nothing to do with these chips. Buy them if you're thinking about it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Flavor
customer_reviews.text: For Christmas this year I purchased this bag of Pecan flavored woodchips along with a smoker for my husband. The value of the Weber woodchips is perfect and the flavor is amazing!! We've had a couple of gatherings so that my husband could show off his skills with the smoker and each time the question everyone asks is what wood chips we use! Pecan flavored wood chips are pretty uncommon where we live so it was a very welcome suprise to everyone and is something we'll be ordering more of for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: C Reid

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: Throwing some of these on top of my charcoal after soaking them for 30 minutes had a whole extra layer of flavor to my meat. I bbq twice a week ever week and just started using these recently.
customer_reviews.author: Choadism

customer_reviews.title: Did not smoke & had no flavor
customer_reviews.text: We followed all the directions and read the reviews,etc... These things were a total failure. No smoke, no flavor, wasted time and money. We used a smoker box and gas grill. Definitely disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Name withheld

customer_reviews.title: Great wood chips
customer_reviews.text: I use these in my smoker frequently. One of my favorites to use it on is pulled pork. They work great and add great flavor to it. I highly recommend if you are needed them for a smoker box.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Chips are moldy/mildewy.
customer_reviews.text: The bag itself stinks like mold/midew. I thought "no worrires". Opened n soaked chips.....and they too, smelled like mold n mildew..even after soak. Was NOT gonna bbq $42 worth of meat, to possibly end up tasting musty mildew n moldy. Will do what I can to get a return completed.
customer_reviews.author: Skippy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, but the wood burns up too quickly!
customer_reviews.text: We tried this in our smoker and we love the flavor pecan wood gives to any kind of meat. But the pieces of wood in the bag are a mix of very small to medium size. There are much more of the very small ones and they simply go up in smoke once the heat hits them. The bigger the chunk of wood, the better. I won't be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: insurance lady

customer_reviews.title: Even chip size-Good quantity for price!
customer_reviews.text: Nice even size chips and a good sized bag. I am a satisfied customer. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Wadsworth

customer_reviews.title: Simple report here. I use in my black box ...
customer_reviews.text: Simple report here . I use in my black box smoke + I add 1 or 2 charcoal brickets & it really helps give that charcoal tast.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kohlhepp

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: We have recently gotten into using wood chips for barbecuing. We soak the wood chips & use a smoke box. The apple chips are absolutely incredible on boneless chicken breasts. I brined them first for a couple of hours. I will be purchasing these apple wood chips again.
customer_reviews.author: Butterfly841

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor - Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I use these in my Weber NG BBQ by putting them in a Weber chip box. For quick grilling, like steak, etc., I don't recommend soaking the chips in water for 30 minutes, or it will take forever for them to smoke, assuming that's what you want. Great flavor! Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Molon Labe 5.56

customer_reviews.title: Love weber wood chips the only reason it gets 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: Love weber wood chips the only reason it gets 4 starts instead of 5 is there always seems to be quite a few pieces of bark which isn't much good for cooking with.
customer_reviews.author: ray4jc

customer_reviews.title: Cherry Wood Chips
customer_reviews.text: I have used these in our electric smoker for a turkey, pork shoulder and wings. All three came out with a nice flavor. I have only used water in the basin so far, but in the future will add some juice to enhance the flavors. I will definitely purchase these going forward.
customer_reviews.author: k626

customer_reviews.title: Great Price and Quality
customer_reviews.text: Just what I ordered! Great price and promptly delivered. Wish they also carried Hickory and Mesquite fo same price.
customer_reviews.author: AvidReader

customer_reviews.title: Great chips evenly sized
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for good sized chips and reasonable price... chips are good sized not dust and not gibungious either so you can’t do anything with them. Came quick and was well packed no issues thank you
customer_reviews.author: Thomas G. Middleton Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful aroma.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like a good mesquite smoke flavor on beef. They burn quickly so spread them out as much as possible. I'm also thinking on soaking them in water overnight to slow the burn. Don't hesitate to buy these!
customer_reviews.author: A. O. Reason

customer_reviews.title: Good staple to have in your grilling accessories stable!!
customer_reviews.text: Very good for the price I soak them in apple juice for me lol and love the red hue it gives and if you add a chunk or 3 of hickory for flavor you get the best if both worlds for relatively cheap !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Me2u

customer_reviews.title: Stale and package torn open
customer_reviews.text: What a mess! Package had big hole in it and so we scooped them up and used them anyway They were stale tasting Just wasted money on them and on our food! Package looked real old too.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great if you don't have a smoker and like smoked meat flavor
customer_reviews.text: Good product if you like the taste of smoked meat but don't want to spend bundles of dollars on a smoker in addition to not wanting smoked meat flavor all the time. Easy to use and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Good sweet smoke flavor. Even size wood chips.
customer_reviews.text: These chips have a good sweet flavor. They are evenly cut which makes for a better smoking experience. Has a good lifespan when smoking. They work better when they’re soaked in Jack Daniels or Jim Beam.
customer_reviews.author: JKN

customer_reviews.title: Great Flavoring
customer_reviews.text: When I soaked them overnight then added them to the smoker they produced amazing flavor and wonderful smoke for my mixture of Oak, Hickory and Pecan Woods....Excellent Results!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wil Engle

customer_reviews.title: Great Flavor!
customer_reviews.text: I did some ribs with them, and they turned out excellent! Oh how my family raved about the ribs!
customer_reviews.author: domecq

customer_reviews.title: Soak these in some water for about 10 minutes, and throw them on your BBQ
customer_reviews.text: These work great, just soak a cup or so in a bowl of water, drain the water, and throw them on your BBQ for that added flavor, produces a lot of smoke, and puts out a great flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Dry and in excellent condition, would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Dry product and in good condition (had bought a different brand kit of wood chips from BJs and they were damp and moldy so tried these guys on amazon and a lot better).
customer_reviews.author: Christine Tuck

customer_reviews.title: Good complimented the dry rub nicely
customer_reviews.text: Tried this first the first time a few weeks ago, and the meat was so tender and the applewood. Good complimented the dry rub nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Newhall

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.text: Love their taste, first time use a little and work your way up. If you use to much it can over power the flavor. (I did this the first time)
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Stamps

customer_reviews.title: Great chips.  What I needed
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, they're wood chips, they fit fine into my electric smoker, and they're pecan!! Dry, reasonably priced, and good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: I find these wood chips to be much better than other brands
customer_reviews.text: I find these wood chips to be much better than other brands. These burn evenly and they are smaller pieces so they fit into the chute on my Masterbuilt smoker nicely without me having to dig through and find smaller ones like the other brands!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Steger

customer_reviews.title: good stuff
customer_reviews.text: and a bargain at $4 pecan is heavy but not overwhelming (like mesquite) - comparable in strength to hickory, but richer and more complex.
customer_reviews.author: GBC

customer_reviews.title: Good chips.
customer_reviews.text: Ok chips. Had some trouble keeping my fire going after I put these on. Good smoke flavor but there are cheaper ones out there. Get them on sale when you can.
customer_reviews.author: electronTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Weekend smoking
customer_reviews.text: We enjoy smoking meats every weekend. The fruit woods tend to be our favorites. The price on Amazon really can’t be beat. We are enjoying these wood chips.
customer_reviews.author: Patience Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Mellow flavor but good flavor
customer_reviews.text: The flavor wasn’t super strong when using with a smoke box, might use pellets next time for a stronger and longer burn. Make sure to soak them before use to have a longer burn
customer_reviews.author: melissa Totman

customer_reviews.title: great price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased ten bags of these chips. At local prices, I saved enough that two bags were free. I use them to make smoked sausage and this savings will mean more cash in my pocket. Great deal. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great for my electric smoker
customer_reviews.text: Bought three bags of different wood chips to use in my electric smoker. I recommend weber wood chips. It's always high quality.
customer_reviews.author: P C

customer_reviews.title: great, small chips
customer_reviews.text: These are fine, small chips for a smoker, but I can get them cheaper at Walmart. So you are paying more to have them delivered to your house.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Knight

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor, not too overpowering if used properly. I enjoy smoked meats, vegetables and cheeses. These chips work extremely well. Great price
customer_reviews.author: Music lover

customer_reviews.title: Applewood is the best
customer_reviews.text: Applewood is the best one. I use it every time I grill. It gives a nice smoky flavor that isn't too strong.
customer_reviews.author: JimBob

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: Product did not work for me but I am using an indoor electric grill. Not hot enough to get a flavor I guess
customer_reviews.author: Linda S.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Was happy to find these at Amazon as most stores where I live don't have Pecan. Smoked a turkey with these chips & it was delicious. Would definitely use these chips again.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Tastes and SMELLS wonderful
customer_reviews.text: We use this for smoking whole chickens in our backyard. It smells heavenly and gives the meat a great, yet subtle flavor. I've ordered this several times, and it's always reliable in quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: Easier than chopping up a tree.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice product. I am not using in a smoker but as a flavoring/coloring agent. Will work great for that.
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD

customer_reviews.title: Gave me the perfect Smokey flavor!
customer_reviews.text: Worked wonderfully to bring a perfect smoky flavor to my meat n veggies! Just soaked them a few hours before drained the water n put them on a square of foil in the corner of the grate, over medium flame n closed the cover...in 5 mins I had rich clean smoke...loved that I got them so reasonably priced...5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More nuanced than mesquite
customer_reviews.text: Used the applewood chips in my electric smoker while I prepared whole chickens and a pastrami. Everything turned out great and had a nice and subtle smoky flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Mititei

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor and smells excellence
customer_reviews.text: Smells excellent and taste great gives good color and flavor to your Meats
customer_reviews.author: curtis schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Bigger bag than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 because i thought the bags would be smaller. My step dad loves them bc he can’t find pecan smoke chips too easily, and these come with a nice amount at a low price
customer_reviews.author: Katlyn

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I live in the southeast so it is a treat to use the Mesquite wood chips. When I was in the Air Force in Texas I took a liking to the Mesquite flavor . GREAT!!
customer_reviews.author: Da Big Moose

customer_reviews.title: Good smoke and flavor
customer_reviews.text: I like apple wood for smoking pork and this puts off good smoke and adds flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor
customer_reviews.text: Product was as expected. Great flavor and makes our grilling better.
customer_reviews.author: T. Sornsen

customer_reviews.title: A must if you Grill
customer_reviews.text: I love using this in my grill and smoker. A must if you Grill
customer_reviews.author: ReedMc

customer_reviews.title: Best of all of them!
customer_reviews.text: The cherry is incredibly delicious ! I find myself using this on everything that I smoke in my Kamado Joe !
customer_reviews.author: Tailoredsuits

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Would buy again but not for three times the price. WTF??
customer_reviews.author: kelly kingman

customer_reviews.title: Weber is good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Works great with smoker box in the Weber grill. Good when u want to smoke fish or chicken without pulling out the big smoker.
customer_reviews.author: Randyl B.

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: great wood chip at an affordable price. Smoke very well, I just wish they were selling bigger bag
customer_reviews.author: ATC

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Will continue to purchase Have tried others and this brand is by far the best
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Ok.
customer_reviews.text: Impulse buy. A bit overpriced. Bought more at local hardware store for half price
customer_reviews.author: mollysdad

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a must have for any smoking enthusiast
customer_reviews.text: I smoked fish, ribs, venison, brats, turkey, full size chickens using this and it worked awesome! I smoke food weekly and this is all I use
customer_reviews.author: David Brekke

customer_reviews.title: Tree love
customer_reviews.text: When a male tree and a female tree love each other, they make woodchips.
customer_reviews.author: Emanuele Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Plan to use these chips for ribs. See no reason why these should not work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence V.

customer_reviews.title: Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Always nice to have these on hand to grill. Purchased several flavors.
customer_reviews.author: DPalm

customer_reviews.title: Great smoke!
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Great smoke, great aroma, great flavor enhancer. More money than “Joe’s”, but worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Gregg George

customer_reviews.title: Great product and fast shipping. Just as described. Very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and fast shipping. Just as described. Very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Works as intended and saved me the trip to big box store
customer_reviews.author: JasonK712

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Mixed with a little whiskey barrel chips and smoked a pork loin roast. It was wonderful. Can’t wait to smoke some Gouda cheese with this.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Nice smoke flavor.
customer_reviews.text: Gives a nice flavor to smoked meat, especially pork. I use this in my electric smoker and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Craig

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor
customer_reviews.text: Great taste, easy to use. We soaked them in water first then put them in the box. Great flavor!
customer_reviews.author: Omars

customer_reviews.title: give great flavor
customer_reviews.text: We use this in our electric smoker and everything we smoke in it it from standing rib roasts to vegetables all taste amazing
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Bodenheim

customer_reviews.title: Chemical smell / tossed in garbage
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I got a bad batch. The smoker had an unusually bad chemical smell. The food had an equally putrid taste. I threw these out.
customer_reviews.author: gb_ott

customer_reviews.title: Great for smokers!
customer_reviews.text: I have never used a product like this before, but I find it really makes a difference. Apple wood is my favorite flavor so far. Works well in my smoker.
customer_reviews.author: jillannfloyd

customer_reviews.title: smokeing deal
customer_reviews.text: The product is great, easy to use and the flavor was wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta L.

customer_reviews.title: Get smoke taste
customer_reviews.text: Soak in water and place in smoker box and my steak was delicious,
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Wittmer

customer_reviews.title: What I expected
customer_reviews.text: I used these chips for pulled pork in a smoker. Flavor was exactly what I was hoping for. Looking forward to next project...smoking a whole chicken.
customer_reviews.author: D. Waselle

customer_reviews.title: Great Smoking Chips, Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I usually smoke with hickory. I wanted more of a subtle flavor, so I gave these chips a shot. Turned out great.
customer_reviews.author: Mathiasove

customer_reviews.title: Great wood chips
customer_reviews.text: These wood chips make food smell and taste great in the smoker. They were a good choice!
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Wood chips
customer_reviews.text: They’re wood chips I don’t know how to make them sound anymore glorious. I wish the bag was bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: was a gift
customer_reviews.text: the family i got these for really like the size of the chips
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great chips!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great chips and great flavor. I use them in my smoke tube instead of pellets to generate more smoke flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Darrin

customer_reviews.title: Same prices as in stores with out the markup
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use cheap and not marked up like online stores. Pick your wood wisely when smoking and i trust webers
customer_reviews.author: Jake pan

customer_reviews.title: Chips
customer_reviews.text: They were chips...they smoke when they get hot. Pretty good flavor
customer_reviews.author: keyhole

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: They are a nice size chunk instead of sawdust, so they last longer in the smoker.
customer_reviews.author: Sharyl H.

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor
customer_reviews.text: I use in an electric smoaker and the flavor is great
customer_reviews.author: Richard Stabile

customer_reviews.title: My favorite chips.
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to product for smoking. I've purchased this many times. Cold-smoked some cheese last night. Good sized chip and produces a flavorful smoke.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Burns great on electric grill I have now because of complex rules. Just throw on grill top when plug in and when grill hot enough in 10 minutes,chips burning nicely. Great flavor
customer_reviews.author: Steve  P

customer_reviews.title: Contents my be flammable
customer_reviews.text: They worked just fine in my smoker. The meat was flavorful and tasty.
customer_reviews.author: 17Soup76

customer_reviews.title: Good price.
customer_reviews.text: Good price. Cheaper on Amazon then in locally stores. Great taste.
customer_reviews.author: Accutek

product_meta.title: Weber Wood Cubic Meter Stephen Products 17138 Apple Chips, 192 cu. in. (0.003 cubi
product_meta.description: Style:AppleWood chunks are great for adding wood smoke flavor to foods, or they can be the perfect alternative to charcoal briquettes as a heat source for grilling. Apple wood gives a slightly sweet, fruity smoke flavor that is great for poultry, game Birds & pork (especially ham).
